Articles.Content: Hello everyone, you can just call me bad I have been playing ksp for a while, but just started this forums thingy (obivously) I would like to say, it is quite splendid here!! Keep up the good work squad!!!
Welcome aboard, Bad! Yes, it is purty nice here, we're glad to have 'ya!
Hello, new thingy to gaze at! Hopey you likey the forums-y. Yay-y.
Greetings, fellow kerbalcrasher. May your launches be successful and your kerbals safe
Welcome to the Program, remember to put boosters on your boosters for optimum boosting!
